18
19#include "LuminanceSource.h"
20
21#include <cstdint>
22#include <memory>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25
26/**
27* This decode images from an address in memory as RGB or ARGB data.
28*/
29class GenericLuminanceSource : public LuminanceSource
30{
31public:
32 /**
33 * Init with a RGB source.
34 */
35 GenericLuminanceSource(int width, int height, const void* bytes, int rowBytes, int pixelBytes, int redIndex, int greenIndex, int blueIndex) :
36 GenericLuminanceSource(0, 0, width, height, bytes, rowBytes, pixelBytes, redIndex, greenIndex, blueIndex) {}
37
38 /**
39 * Init with a RGB source, left, top, width, height specify the subregion area in orignal image; 'bytes' points to the begining of image buffer (i.e. pixel (0,0)).
40 */
41 GenericLuminanceSource(int left, int top, int width, int height, const void* bytes, int rowBytes, int pixelBytes, int redIndex, int greenIndex, int blueIndex);
42
43 /**
44 * Init with a grayscale source.
45 */
46 GenericLuminanceSource(int width, int height, const void* bytes, int rowBytes) :
47 GenericLuminanceSource(0, 0, width, height, bytes, rowBytes) {}
48
49 /**
50 * Init with a grayscale source, left, top, width, height specify the subregion area in orignal image; 'bytes' points to the begining of image buffer (i.e. pixel (0,0)).
51 */
52 GenericLuminanceSource(int left, int top, int width, int height, const void* bytes, int rowBytes) :
53 GenericLuminanceSource(left, top, width, height, bytes, rowBytes, 1, 0, 0, 0) {}
54
55 /**
56 * Init with a grayscale source, left, top, width, height specify the subregion area in orignal image; 'bytes' points the begining of image buffer (i.e. pixel (0,0)).
57 */
58 GenericLuminanceSource(int left, int top, int width, int height, std::shared_ptr<const ByteArray> pixels, int rowBytes);
59
60 virtual int width() const override;
61 virtual int height() const override;
62 virtual const uint8_t* getRow(int y, ByteArray& buffer, bool forceCopy = false) const override;
63 virtual const uint8_t* getMatrix(ByteArray& buffer, int& outRowBytes, bool forceCopy = false) const override;
64 virtual bool canCrop() const override;
65 virtual std::shared_ptr<LuminanceSource> cropped(int left, int top, int width, int height) const override;
66 virtual bool canRotate() const override;
67 virtual std::shared_ptr<LuminanceSource> rotated(int degreeCW) const override;
68
69private:
70 std::shared_ptr<const ByteArray> _pixels;
71 int _left;
72 int _top;
73 int _width;
74 int _height;
75 int _rowBytes;
76};
77
78} // ZXing
79
